messages.title: Vote Labour to bring our country together again
messages.content: Boris Johnson's Tories are the biggest threat to Scotland's place in the UK. Labour has a plan to rebuild and transform Scotland, so that no one is held back and no community is neglected.

Vote Labour on Thursday 12 December to: Invest an additional £100 billion in Scotland’s people, communities and public services. Provide an extra £2 billion a year additional investment to rebuild Scotland's NHS, cut waiting times and solve the GP crisis. Boost family living standards with: a £10 an hour minimum wage for all ages and a 5% pay rise for all public sector workers from April next year. Protect pensions and provide compensation for WASPI women. Kick start a Green Industrial Revolution to tackle the climate emergency and create high-skilled, high-wage jobs. End the SNP mismanagement of Scotland’s public services: properly supporting our schools, hospitals and police.

Kick start a Green Industrial Revolution to tackle the climate emergency and create high-skilled, high-wage jobs.
End the SNP mismanagement of Scotland’s public services: properly supporting our schools, hospitals and police.
